hero-subtitle: Product Designer · 7 Years in Tech · B2B SaaS & Fintech
hero-description: I design digital products that people actually use — from complex fintech dashboards to restaurant automation systems. With 4 years in frontend development and 3 years in UX/UI design, I bridge the gap between what looks great and what ships on time.
ronto-case-desc: IT company — AI, blockchain, and AR
footer-title: Always open to interesting projects, collaboration, and friendly conversation.
personal-info-desc-1: I have been designing digital products for three years now, building on my previous four years of experience in developing fintech products and SaaS solutions. This combination allows me to create interfaces that are not only aesthetically pleasing and user-friendly, but also take into account the technical possibilities of implementation.
personal-info-desc-2: My key strengths are the ability to collaborate with teams, solve complex problems based on data and feedback, and balance user needs with business goals.
personal-info-desc-3: As a designer-developer, I create interactive and technically feasible designs that simplify the development process and improve user experience.
personal-info-desc-4: Understanding the technical aspects, I create thoughtful systems that can be easily expanded and adapted to future changes.
download-cv: Click the image below to download my CV
creatego-hero-subtitle: No-code builder that empowers designers to build production-ready apps through visual interface
creatego-problem: Designers depend on developers to turn prototypes into working apps, slowing down the launch cycle
creatego-solution: Visual builder with Figma import, allowing designers to assemble MVPs without coding knowledge
creatego-skills: UI/UX Design, Design System, Prototyping, User Research
creatego-case-about-description: CreateGo offers an intuitive builder with the ability to import layouts from Figma, automating routine tasks and allowing designers to quickly assemble prototypes and MVPs without the need for programming knowledge.
creatego-ui-description: UI elements based on design system Xela, with contrast white and blue palette for clear visual hierarchy.
ronto-hero-subtitle: Corporate website for an IT company launching startups in AI, blockchain, and augmented reality
ronto-problem: The company needed a unified website to present and promote products across AI, data analytics, blockchain, and AR
ronto-solution: Minimalist, clean landing page showcasing key solutions and services, plus 3 individual product websites
ronto-skills: UI/UX Design, Branding, Logo Design, Mobile Adaptation
ronto-case-about-description: Ronto Tech is an IT company that launches startups in the fields of Blockchain, Data Analytics, AR, and AI. This website showcases their main cases and information about the company.
ronto-logo-description: The meaning of the Ronto Tech logo: the use of the number 10 raised to the power of -27 (Ronto) emphasizes the scale and depth of technological solutions. The first letters illustrate both exponentiation and the essence of the word itself.
ronto-also-made: I also designed 3 product websites for this company:
